description: This is the 2009 trail for the Canadian Ski Marathon.  It varies a bit each year as landowners change their minds and the weather affects things.I've entered in the past but for the last 20 years have instead worked on the safety team patrolling and sweeping the sections.For more details (and to sign up if you want) look here  http://www.csm-mcs.com/
directions: Buses leave from Montebello and other locations.  See the CSM web site for more details.
title: Canadian Ski Marathon 2009
